refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: An example is a formal example with a title. Examples often contain programlistings or other large, block elements. Frequently they are given xml:ids and referenced from the text with xref or link.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: DocBook does not specify the location of the example within the final displayed flow of text; it may float or remain where it is located.
A list of examples may be generated at the beginning of a document.
If a label is specified, that label will be used for identifying the example and in generated cross-references. If unspecified, examples are often, but not always, numbered.
If a width is specified, formatters may use this value to determine scaling or rotation.
